title: CVS Health 's number of stores 2005 to 2018
summary: In 2018 , barnes & noble had 627 stores in the country , three fewer than in the previous year . The company had 726 locations all across the country back in 2008 , however this figure has been decreasing ever since , with the sharpest drop recorded between 2012 and 2013 . barnes & noble has had a patchy few years in terms of its profitability and reported a net loss of almost 125.5 million U.S. dollars in 2018 , followed by net income of just 3.77 million in 2019 .
gold: This statistic depicts CVS Health 's number of stores from 2005 to 2018 . The CVS Health Corporation is a U.S. drug retailing company , with three major segments : Pharmacy Services , Retail/LTC , and Corporate . CVS Health is headquartered in Woonsocket , Rhode Island .
